sentence.text: In gastrointestinal tumors, negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II plays an oncogenic role through DNA demethylation.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: However, the role of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II in the prognosis of human glioma prognosis remains unclear.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: In this research, we discovered that negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II was significantly increased in glioma tissues in contrast to normal brain tissues (NBTs; P AAAA 0.05).

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Furthermore, a high level of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II in patients with glioma acted as an independent biomarker to predict reduced survival (P = 0.026).

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: In an in vitro experiment, negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II can promote the proliferation, migration, and invasion of glioma cells and inhibit cell apoptosis by activating positive regulation of protein phosphorylation-angiogenesis pathway.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
